main event: A woman spotted a big red ball in the sky in Dayton, Ohio on December 25, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a saucer shape,The red ball kept disappearing and reappearing in the sky,The observation lasted for about 20 minutes, The object was estimated to be 45 degrees above the horizon, The case was concluded as an astronomical object (star/planet).
sighted object: a big red ball in the sky
